Name: oid
Description: Row identifier (hidden attribute; must be explicitly\nselected)

Name: amname
Description: Name of the access method

Name: amstrategies
Description: Number of operator strategies for this access method, or zero\nif access method does not have a fixed set of operator strategies

Name: amsupport
Description: Number of support routines for this access method

Name: amcanorder
Description: Does the access method support ordered scans sorted by the\nindexed column's value?

Name: amcanorderbyop
Description: Does the access method support ordered scans sorted by the\nresult of an operator on the indexed column?

Name: amcanbackward
Description: Does the access method support backward scanning?

Name: amcanunique
Description: Does the access method support unique indexes?

Name: amcanmulticol
Description: Does the access method support multicolumn indexes?

Name: amoptionalkey
Description: Does the access method support a scan without any constraint\nfor the first index column?

Name: amsearcharray
Description: Does the access method support ScalarArrayOpExpr searches?

Name: amsearchnulls
Description: Does the access method support IS\nNULL/NOT NULL searches?

Name: amstorage
Description: Can index storage data type differ from column data type?

Name: amclusterable
Description: Can an index of this type be clustered on?

Name: ampredlocks
Description: Does an index of this type manage fine-grained predicate\nlocks?

Name: amkeytype
Description: Type of data stored in index, or zero if not a fixed type

Name: aminsert
Description: Insert this tuple function

Name: ambeginscan
Description: Prepare for index scan\nfunction

Name: amgettuple
Description: Next valid tuple function, or zero\nif none

Name: amgetbitmap
Description: Fetch all valid tuples function,\nor zero if none

Name: amrescan
Description: (Re)start index scan function

Name: amendscan
Description: Clean up after index scan\nfunction

Name: ammarkpos
Description: Mark current scan position\nfunction

Name: amrestrpos
Description: Restore marked scan position\nfunction

Name: ambuild
Description: Build new index function

Name: ambuildempty
Description: Build empty index function

Name: ambulkdelete
Description: Bulk-delete function

Name: amvacuumcleanup
Description: Post-VACUUM cleanup function

Name: amcanreturn
Description: Function to check whether index supports index-only scans, or\nzero if none

Name: amcostestimate
Description: Function to estimate cost of an index scan

Name: amoptions
Description: Function to parse and validate reloptions for an index
